modName: World of Warcraft Orc for RaceMenu
descriptionHtml:
Mods needed:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] (and it's requirements)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21232/?]Skyrim - Glowing Eyes v4
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]Beards[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]
[/url]Use:

Open Racemenu (showracemenu in console), select Orc race. Press the preset tab in Racemenu and load preset Ixum_WoW_Orc

Bodymod used in pics:

[url=http://www.ladymoiraine.com/index.php?/files/]SAM[/url] with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59944/?]Ixum's Texture replacer
[/url]Skeleton used [url=http://www.loverslab.com/topic/25971-xp32-maximum-skeleton-extended/]XPSME[/url] 

Installation:

Can be installed with NMM/MO, or manually
author: Ixum
